p: Since then, considerable work has expanded knowledge on this phenomenon referred to as antibody-dependent enhancement (ADE); described as cross-reactive IgG antibodies from a previous infection with poor neutralizing capability which bind the heterologous serotype and enhances its uptake via FcRâ€™s into host cells [ 51, 64]. This is likely a mediator of increased viremia mediated through increased host cell infection [ 64].
